fullText: This superbly acted revival of Harold Pinter's 'Betrayal' is a master class in the art of theatrical subtlety. The production achieves a rare intimacy that makes the audience complicit in the characters' deceptions.
dtliExcerpt: This superbly acted revival of Harold Pinter's 'Betrayal' is a master class in the art of theatrical subtlety. The production achieves a rare intimacy that makes the audience complicit in the characters' deceptions.
